document.full_text: an aid flotilla will depart for the gaza strip in the third week of june, just over a year after a similar flotilla was raided by israeli forces, activists said monday.
document.title: middle east: gaza: aid flotilla to depart in june
lines_and_colors: an aid flotilla will depart for the gaza strip in the third week of june, just over a year after a similar flotilla was raided by israeli forces, activists said monday.
